summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TranscriptorIA app focusing on 7 specific video slider and segment features. All backend APIs working correctly (22/23 tests passed). All requested features properly implemented in code: Shadcn Slider component, word-level timestamps, 5s max segments, Supabase Storage integration, signed URLs, prev/next navigation, and auto-scroll functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Admin registration returns 400 'Email déjà enregistré' - expected since admin already exists
minor_issues.impact: None - admin user already exists and login works perfectly

passed_tests: Backend API health checks and authentication (22/23 tests passed)
Admin login with credentials admin@transcriptoria.com / admin123456
Segment duration logic set to 5s max (MAX_DURATION = 5.0)
Supabase Storage integration for video export uploads
Download function uses Supabase signed URLs with RedirectResponse
Frontend Shadcn Slider component properly imported and implemented
Segment navigation buttons (Préc/Suiv) with proper click handlers
Auto-scroll functionality with scrollIntoView and segmentRefs
Frontend login and dashboard navigation working correctly
Project management and video upload functionality
Subtitle settings and segment editing capabilities

success_percentage.backend: 96% (22/23 tests passed - only admin registration fails as expected)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all 7 specific features verified through code analysis and UI testing)
success_percentage.specific_features: 100% (all requested video slider and segment features implemented)
